comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.186 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

I had page with 5 checkboxes.
I checked the second checkbox and reload page by F5.


Actual results:

Checkboxes state restored from cache. But forth checkbox was checked and second checkbox was unchecked


Expected results:

Second checkbox should be checked
comments.creator: VUFedotov@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 566456
FireFox Checkbox cache bug.rar

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.186 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

I had page with 5 checkboxes.
I checked the second checkbox and reload page by F5.


Actual results:

Checkboxes state restored from cache. But forth checkbox was checked and second checkbox was unchecked


Expected results:

Second checkbox should be checked
comments.author: VUFedotov@gmail.com
